mapper.update: update report set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_step = #{testStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_info = #{deviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, user_id, name, state, description, test_step, device_info, create_time from report where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, project_id, user_id, name, state, description, test_step, device_info, create_time from report
